sentences.en: All the papers were haphazardly strewn on desks.
sentences.cn: 所有文件杂乱地散落在书桌上.

sentences.en: Bulges and tentacles of ore extend haphazardly from a central mass.
sentences.cn: 矿石的凸出物及细枝不时地从中心块体伸出.

sentences.en: He stumbled haphazardly through the 5 th and 6 th forms.
sentences.cn: 他好不容易胡乱地读完了五六年级.

sentences.en: It is foolish to haphazardly adventure.
It results in a rather haphazardly curved path.
sentences.cn: 它产生一种相当不规则的轨迹.

sentences.en: She looked at the books jammed haphazardly in the shelves.
sentences.cn: 她看着乱七八糟地塞在书架上的那些书。

sentences.en: The books were placed haphazardly on the shelf.
sentences.cn: 书籍乱七八糟地堆放在书架上.

words.tran_cn: 偶然的；随便的；无计划的
